summary: DFB Random Encounters 1.2 MCM is a lightweight spawning mod. It places 230 dynamic spawn points into Skyrim. You can take full control of them and decide what enemies are spawned, how many spawn and how hard they are to defeat.
descriptionHtml:
[size=-1][b]Version:[/b] v1.2
[b]Date:[/b] 02/03/2014
[b]Author:[/b] Darkfirebird & lifestorock[/size]
[color=Firebrick][b]Please endorse the original mod:[/b][/color][b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11836]DFB - Random Encounters
[/url][/b][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11836]
[/url][/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12660/?][size=2]A Version for Skyrim Special Edition can be found here![/size][/url]
[line]

[center][img]http://abload.de/img/dfblogoqeswj.png[/img]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12660/?][color=#ff0000][size=4][u]A Version for Skyrim Special Edition can be found here!

[/u][/size][/color][/url][/center][size=+1][color=A52A2A]Description:[/color][/size]
This is an update, with permission of the original author, for one of my favourite mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11836]DFB - Random Encounters[/url].

This mod adds 230 new spawn points into the wilderness of Skyrim. DFB uses a completely separate spawning system and is pretty much compatible with everything. The mod is fully customizable. The spawn type, amount and difficulty can be altered to fit all playstyles.


[size=+1][color=A52A2A]Changesv1.2:[/color][/size]

[b]General Changes:[/b]
[list]
[*]added Giant, Alikr, Vigilantes of Stendarr and ambient animal encounter
[*]added 15 new spawn points (contains currently 230 new dynamic spawn points)
[*]rebuilt MCM -> use of option states instead of option variables
[*]fixed several minor issues
[*]added new MCM option to choose an "Immersive Preset"
[/list]
[b]New Immersive Preset:[/b]
[list]
[*]Vampires, Werewolves, Draugr & Ghosts only spawn at night
[*]Dwemer Automatons & Falmer spawn only near Falmer dens and / or Dwemer Ruins
[*]Forsworn will now only spawn in the Reach
[*]implemented a region check to spawn either normal or snow animals / creatures
[/list]


[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][u]New MCM Configuration Menu:[/u][/color][/size]
[center]
[url=http://abload.de/img/12di27.png][img]http://abload.de/thumb2/12di27.png[/img][/url] [url=http://abload.de/img/208fqb.png][img]http://abload.de/thumb2/208fqb.png[/img][/url] [url=http://abload.de/img/3z2e06.png][img]http://abload.de/thumb2/3z2e06.png[/img][/url] [url=http://abload.de/img/41xd73.png][img]http://abload.de/thumb2/41xd73.png[/img][/url] [url=http://abload.de/img/530igc.png][img]http://abload.de/thumb2/530igc.png[/img][/url] [url=http://abload.de/img/687f6l.png][img]http://abload.de/thumb2/687f6l.png[/img][/url] [/center]

Click on the README button to read the full mod description!


[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Installation / Upgrading:[/b][/color][/size]

[color=#ff0000]Requires Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8[/color] + [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE [/url]+ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI 3.4[/url]

[list]
[*]Download & Install the mod - installing the original mod is NOT required anymore
[*]Make sure no loose files from previous versions are present
[/list]
[line]


[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Credits:[/b][/color][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/192633]Darkfirebird[/url] for the brilliant original mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11836]DFB - Random Encounters[/url]
[/list]

[b]Permission Note:[/b]
You must contact the original author [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/192633]Darkfirebird[/url] for any permission requests.
author: Darkfirebird and lifestorock
